DOC.brief_summary: The aim study gain new knowledge impact hamstring tendon harvest apply knowledge treatment management patient undergo anterior cruciate ligament ( ACL ) reconstruction . There three main component study : 1 . How muscle shape , size , strength , ability function change follow hamstring graft ACL reconstruction ; 2 . How physical activity change follow ACL reconstruction ; 3 . Is difference outcome graft harvest do injured versus uninjured limb
DOC.brief_title: Changes Muscle Morphology Resulting From Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.criteria: 18 50 year old ; isolate ACL rupture confirm MRI physical mental health issue affect ability complete rehabilitation and/or study followup
